      • getClientId

        public static java.lang.String getClientId​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate clientCert)
        Determine the string to be used as the remote host session Id for authorization purposes. Associate this client identifier with a ServerCnxn that has been authenticated over SSL, and any ACLs that refer to the authenticated client.
        Parameters:
        clientCert - Authenticated X509Certificate associated with the remote host.
        Returns:
        Identifier string to be associated with the client. The clientId can be any string matched and extracted using regex from Subject Distinguished Name or Subject Alternative Name from x509 certificate. The clientId string is intended to be an URI for client and map the client to certain domain.

      • getClientId

        public static java.lang.String getClientId​(ServerCnxn cnxn,
                                           javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager trustManager)
                                    throws KeeperException.AuthFailedException
        Extract the authenticated client Id from the specified server connection object.
        Parameters:
        cnxn - Server connection object that contains the certificate.
        trustManager - X509 TrustManager for authentication.
        Returns:
        Identifier string to be associated with the client. The clientId can be any string matched and extracted using regex from Subject Distinguished Name or Subject Alternative Name from x509 certificate. The clientId string is intended to be an URI for client and map the client to certain domain.
        Throws:
        KeeperException.AuthFailedException - Failed to authenticate the client certificate

      • getAuthenticatedClientCert

        public static java.security.cert.X509Certificate getAuthenticatedClientCert​(ServerCnxn cnxn,
                                                                            javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager trustManager)
                                                                     throws KeeperException.AuthFailedException
        Get a client certificate from server connection object and authenticate the certificate using X509TrustManager
        Parameters:
        cnxn - ServerCnxn object
        trustManager -
        Returns:
        The authenticated client certificate
        Throws:
        KeeperException.AuthFailedException - Failed to authenticate the client certificate
